Education

Department of Animal husbandry and breeding, Institute of Animal science
  • In collaboration with Fraunhofer Institute of Algorithms and Scientific Computing (SCAI), Sankt Augustin, Germany.
  • Thesis title: Application of knowledge discovery and data mining methods in livestock genomics for hypothesis generation and identification of biomarker candidates influencing meat quality traits in pigs.

Bonn-Aachen International Center for Information Technology (B-IT)
  • Thesis title: Adaptation of the mining environment SCAIView to the needs of animal scientists.

Research experience

University of Copenhagen
  • Implementing and adapting workflows for Ribo-seq data analysis.
  • Adapting and implementing analsis pipelines for ChIP-seq and repeat element data analysis.
  • Implementing visualization schemes for in-house sequencing data.
  • Adapting and designing pipeline for mining and scoring CRISPR/Cas guide RNAs.
EMBL Heidelberg
  • Designing meta-analysis methods for RNA-seq results from various experimental conditions to study genomics of plant (A. thaliana) developmental patterning
  • Implementing expression based clustering method for profiling genes involved in plant developmental patterning.
  • Implementing in-house web application for precomputed sequence similarity based clustering and gene annotation retrieval.
University of Bonn
  • Implementing analysis pipelines for next generation sequencing (RNA-seq) data.
  • Statistical analysis of gene expression profiles and polymorphisms from RNA-seq data.
  • Integrating gene co-expression profiles from RNA-seq data with metabolic interaction networks.
  • Profiling gene co-expression clusters through meta-analysis of multiple datasets.
  • Implementing data enrichment analysis pipelines based on gene annotations.
  • Designing variant filtering and annotation pipeline based on results from existing variant calling algorithms.
  • Implementing pipelines for gene cross referencing from biological databases.
